mcq.statement: What was the primary purpose behind writing Tarikhi-I-Sher?

options.b: To pay regard to Shah Suri's success in administration

mcq.one_liner: The main purpose of writing Tarikhi-I-Sher was to pay tribute to **Shah Suri's success in administration**.

suggestions.topic: Decline: Ahmad Sirhindi, Shah Waliullah, Maratha Empire 1674-1818
